card.name: Self Reflection
card.description: {{KW:PARALYZE}} a monster. {{KW:DELAY}}: If it was an ally, give it {{KW:CANDY}} and {{STATS:+1|+1}}. If it was an enemy, add a {{CARD:551|1}} to your hand.
